schema.name: breeds
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `breeds` (`breed_name` varchar(255) null default null, `date_created` datetime null default null, `date_updated` datetime null default null, `id` integer not null primary key autoincrement)

schema.name: constituencies
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `constituencies` (`constituency_name` varchar(255) null default null, `date_created` datetime null default null, `date_updated` datetime null default null, `id` integer not null primary key autoincrement)

schema.name: contact_and_useful_information
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `contact_and_useful_information` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `status` varchar(255) not null default 'draft', `title` varchar(255) null, `description` text null)

schema.name: news
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "news" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `date_created` datetime NULL, `date_updated` datetime NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `description` text NULL, `news_image` char(36) NULL, `published_date` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `news_news_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`news_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: news_directus_roles
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "news_directus_roles" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `news_id` integer NULL, `directus_roles_id` char(36) NULL, CONSTRAINT `news_directus_roles_directus_roles_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_roles_id`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `news_directus_roles_news_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`news_id`) REFERENCES `news` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: news_directus_users
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "news_directus_users" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `news_id` integer NULL, `directus_users_id` char(36) NULL, CONSTRAINT `news_directus_users_directus_users_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_users_id`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `news_directus_users_news_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`news_id`) REFERENCES `news` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: notifications
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "notifications" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `date_created` datetime NULL, `date_updated` datetime NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `description` text NULL, `published_date` datetime NULL, `expiry_date` datetime NULL, `is_read` boolean NULL DEFAULT '1', `staff` char(36) NULL, `notification_type` varchar(255) null, CONSTRAINT `notifications_staff_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`staff`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: notifications_directus_users
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "notifications_directus_users" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `notifications_id` integer NULL, `directus_users_id` char(36) NULL, CONSTRAINT `notifications_directus_users_directus_users_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_users_id`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `notifications_directus_users_notifications_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`notifications_id`) REFERENCES `notifications` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: owned_survey_results
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "owned_survey_results" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `user_created` char(36) NULL, `date_created` datetime NULL, `user_updated` char(36) NULL, `date_updated` datetime NULL, `gender` varchar(255) NULL, `age_group` varchar(255) NULL, `monthly_income_status_of_earner` varchar(255) NULL, `education` varchar(255) NULL, `How_many_pet_dogs__do_you_have` varchar(255) NULL, `How_many_male_and_female_dogs_do_you_have` varchar(255) NULL, `are_your_pets_registered` varchar(255) NULL, `are_your_pets_sterilized` varchar(255) NULL, `Which_veterinary_doctor_do_you_visit_for_your_pets` varchar(255) NULL, `Do_you_know_that_the_MSAW_offers_free_sterilsation_for_your_dog` varchar(255) NULL, `do_you_have_secured_place_for_your_pets_at_your_place` varchar(255) NULL, `are_your_pets_let_free_on_the_streets` varchar(255) NULL, `have_you_ever_had_a_pet_which_got_lost` varchar(255) NULL, `have_you_ever_found_yourself_in_a_situation_where_you_had_to_discard_a_pet` varchar(255) NULL, `if_yes_state_which_reason` text NULL, `are_there_stray_dogs_near_your_home_place_of_work` varchar(255) NULL, `are_you_scared_of_stray_dogs` varchar(255) NULL, `if_yes_state_reason_why` text NULL, `have_you_ever_fed_or_cared_for_a_stray_dog` varchar(255) NULL, `have_you_ever_adopted_a_pet_from_a_nonprofit_organisation` varchar(255) NULL, `do_you_think_that_stray_dogs_should_be_removed_from_the_streets` varchar(255) NULL, `have_you_heard_of_the_CNR_project` varchar(255) NULL, `do_you_think_that_the_stray_should_be_released_back_to_their_place_after_sterilisation` varchar(255) NULL, `do_you_know_that_MSAW_is_Ex_MSPCA` varchar(255) NULL, `what_is_your_opinion_about_the_MSAW` text NULL, `what_are_your_suggestions_to_the_MSAW` text NULL, `geo_location` json NULL, `location` text NULL, `survey_information` integer NULL, `staff` char(36) NULL, `status` varchar(255) NULL, `remarks` text NULL, `owner_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `age_of_pets` varchar(255) NULL, CONSTRAINT `owned_survey_results_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `owned_survey_results_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `owned_survey_results_survey_information_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`survey_information`) REFERENCES `survey` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `owned_survey_results_staff_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`staff`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: region
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "region" (`constituency` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `inhabitant` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `zip_code` integer null, CONSTRAINT `region_constituency_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`constituency`) REFERENCES `constituencies` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `region_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: survey
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "survey" (`date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `is_closed` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `region` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `start_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `staff` char(36) NULL, `end_date` datetime null, CONSTRAINT `survey_region_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`region`) REFERENCES `region` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `survey_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `survey_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `survey_staff_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`staff`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: survey_results
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "survey_results" (`age` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `animal` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'dog', `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `dog_breed` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `geo_location` json NULL DEFAULT null, `has_microchip` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `health_state` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `identifying_marks` text NULL DEFAULT null, `is_aggressive` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `is_living_with_other_dogs` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `is_sterilized` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `microchip_serial` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `primary_image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `remarks` text NULL DEFAULT null, `sex` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `staff` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'submitted', `survey_information` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `weather_condition` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `Location` text NULL, `survey_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_dog_breed_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`dog_breed`) REFERENCES `breeds` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_primary_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`primary_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_staff_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`staff`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_survey_information_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`survey_information`) REFERENCES `survey` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `survey_results_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: directus_activity
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_activity" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `action` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `user` char(36), `timestamp` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `ip` varchar(50), `user_agent` varchar(255), `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `comment` text, `origin` varchar(255) null)

schema.name: directus_collections
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_collections" (`collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(30), `note` text, `display_template` varchar(255), `hidden` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `singleton` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `translations` json, `archive_field` varchar(64), `archive_app_filter` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `archive_value` varchar(255), `unarchive_value` varchar(255), `sort_field` varchar(64), `accountability` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'all', `color` varchar(255) NULL, `item_duplication_fields` json NULL, `sort` integer, `group` varchar(64), `collapse` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open', `preview_url` varchar(255) null, `versioning` boolean not null default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`collection`), FOREIGN KEY (`group`) REFERENCES `directus_collections` (`collection`))

schema.name: directus_fields
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_fields" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `field` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `special` varchar(64), `interface` varchar(64), `options` json, `display` varchar(64), `display_options` json, `readonly` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hidden` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sort` integer, `width` varchar(30) DEFAULT 'full', `translations` json, `note` text, `conditions` json, `required` boolean DEFAULT '0', `group` varchar(64), `validation` json, `validation_message` text)

schema.name: directus_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_files" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `storage` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `filename_disk` varchar(255), `filename_download` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255), `type` varchar(255), `folder` char(36), `uploaded_by` char(36), `uploaded_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modified_by` char(36), `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `charset` varchar(50), `filesize` bigint DEFAULT null, `width` integer, `height` integer, `duration` integer, `embed` varchar(200), `description` text, `location` text, `tags` text, `metadata` json, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`uploaded_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`modified_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`folder`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_folders
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_folders" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `parent` char(36), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_migrations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_migrations` (`version` varchar(255) not null, `name` varchar(255) not null, `timestamp` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, primary key (`version`))

schema.name: directus_permissions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_permissions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `role` char(36), `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `action` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `permissions` json, `validation` json, `presets` json, `fields` text, FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_presets
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_presets" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `bookmark` varchar(255), `user` char(36), `role` char(36), `collection` varchar(64), `search` varchar(100), `layout` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'tabular', `layout_query` json, `layout_options` json, `refresh_interval` integer, `filter` json, `icon` varchar(30) DEFAULT 'bookmark', `color` varchar(255) NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`user`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_relations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_relations" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `many_collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `many_field` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `one_collection` varchar(64), `one_field` varchar(64), `one_collection_field` varchar(64), `one_allowed_collections` text, `junction_field` varchar(64), `sort_field` varchar(64), `one_deselect_action` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nullify')

schema.name: directus_revisions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_revisions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `activity` integer NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `data` json, `delta` json, `parent` integer, `version` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `directus_revisions` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`activity`) REFERENCES `directus_activity` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`version`) REFERENCES `directus_versions` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_roles
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_roles" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'supervised_user_circle', `description` text, `ip_access` text, `enforce_tfa` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `admin_access` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `app_access` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_sessions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_sessions" (`token` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `user` char(36), `expires` datetime NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(255), `user_agent` varchar(255), `share` char(36), `origin` varchar(255) null, PRIMARY KEY (`token`), FOREIGN KEY (`user`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`share`) REFERENCES `directus_shares` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_settings
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_settings" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `project_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Directus', `project_url` varchar(255), `project_color` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '#6644FF', `project_logo` char(36), `public_foreground` char(36), `public_background` char(36), `public_note` text, `auth_login_attempts` integer DEFAULT '25', `auth_password_policy` varchar(100), `storage_asset_transform` varchar(7) DEFAULT 'all', `storage_asset_presets` json, `custom_css` text, `storage_default_folder` char(36), `basemaps` json, `mapbox_key` varchar(255), `module_bar` json, `project_descriptor` varchar(100) NULL, `default_language` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en-US', `custom_aspect_ratios` json, `public_favicon` char(36), `default_appearance` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'auto', `default_theme_light` varchar(255), `theme_light_overrides` json, `default_theme_dark` varchar(255), `theme_dark_overrides` json, FOREIGN KEY (`project_logo`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`public_foreground`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`public_background`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `directus_settings_storage_default_folder_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`storage_default_folder`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`public_favicon`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_users
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_users" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(50), `last_name` varchar(50), `email` varchar(128), `password` varchar(255), `location` varchar(255), `title` varchar(50), `description` text, `tags` json, `avatar` char(36), `language` varchar(255) DEFAULT null, `tfa_secret` varchar(255), `status` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active', `role` char(36), `token` varchar(255), `last_access` datetime, `last_page` varchar(255), `provider` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default', `external_identifier` varchar(255), `auth_data` json, `email_notifications` boolean DEFAULT '1', `appearance` varchar(255), `theme_dark` varchar(255), `theme_light` varchar(255), `theme_light_overrides` json, `theme_dark_overrides` json, `surname_at_birth` varchar(255) NULL, `gender` varchar(255) NULL, `citizen_of_mauritius` varchar(255) NULL, `nic` varchar(255) NULL, `address` varchar(255) NULL, `town` varchar(255) NULL, `fixed_line_number` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `mobile_number` varchar(255) NULL, `date_of_birth` varchar(255) null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_webhooks
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_webhooks" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `method` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'POST', `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active', `data` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `actions` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `collections` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `headers` json)

schema.name: directus_dashboards
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_dashboards` (`id` char(36) not null, `name` varchar(255) not null, `icon` varchar(30) not null default 'dashboard', `note` text, `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), `color` varchar(255) null, foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_panels
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_panels" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `dashboard` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255), `icon` varchar(30) DEFAULT null, `color` varchar(10), `show_header` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `note` text, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `position_x` integer NOT NULL, `position_y` integer NOT NULL, `width` integer NOT NULL, `height` integer NOT NULL, `options` json, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`dashboard`) REFERENCES `directus_dashboards` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_notifications
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_notifications" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `timestamp` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'inbox', `recipient` char(36) NOT NULL, `sender` char(36), `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `message` text, `collection` varchar(64), `item` varchar(255), FOREIGN KEY (`recipient`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`sender`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_shares
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_shares" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255), `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `role` char(36), `password` varchar(255), `user_created` char(36), `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_start` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_end` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `times_used` integer DEFAULT '0', `max_uses` integer, FOREIGN KEY (`collection`) REFERENCES `directus_collections` (`collection`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_flows
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_flows` (`id` char(36) not null, `name` varchar(255) not null, `icon` varchar(30), `color` varchar(255) null, `description` text, `status` varchar(255) not null default 'active', `trigger` varchar(255), `accountability` varchar(255) default 'all', `options` json, `operation` char(36), `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_operations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_operations` (`id` char(36) not null, `name` varchar(255), `key` varchar(255) not null, `type` varchar(255) not null, `position_x` integer not null, `position_y` integer not null, `options` json, `resolve` char(36), `reject` char(36), `flow` char(36) not null, `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), foreign key(`resolve`) references `directus_operations`(`id`), foreign key(`reject`) references `directus_operations`(`id`), foreign key(`flow`) references `directus_flows`(`id`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_translations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_translations` (`id` char(36) not null, `language` varchar(255) not null, `key` varchar(255) not null, `value` text not null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_versions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_versions` (`id` char(36) not null, `key` varchar(64) not null, `name` varchar(255), `collection` varchar(64) not null, `item` varchar(255) not null, `hash` varchar(255), `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_updated` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), `user_updated` char(36), foreign key(`collection`) references `directus_collections`(`collection`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, foreign key(`user_updated`) references `directus_users`(`id`), primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_extensions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_extensions` (`name` varchar(255) not null, `enabled` boolean not null default '1', primary key (`name`))
